events.name: Los Angeles Kings at Winnipeg Jets

headlines.description: — Mark Scheifele broke a tie with 8:13 left with his second goal of the game, Connor Hellebuyck made 30 saves and the Winnipeg Jets beat the Los Angeles Kings 3-2 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mark Scheifele scores twice in the Jets' 3-2 victory over the Kings

headlines.description: — Jeremy Swayman made 21 saves, Pavel Zacha, Mark Kastelic and Sean Kuraly scored and the Boston Bruins beat the Buffalo Sabres 3-1 on Saturday night to run their season-opening winning streak to three.

events.name: Toronto Maple Leafs at Detroit Red Wings

headlines.description: — Lucas Raymond scored twice, including the 100th goal of his career, and the Detroit Red Wings pulled away to a 6-3 victory over the Toronto Maple Leafs on Saturday night.

headlines.description: — Connor Brown scored twice, Nico Hischier and Timo Meier each had a goal and two an assist, and the New Jersey Devils beat the Tampa Bay Lightning 5-3 on Saturday night for their first win of the season.

events.name: Columbus Blue Jackets at Minnesota Wild
